actions.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 242 (Roll no. 380).

description: Amendment sought to restore funding to the FY 2013 levels for the cleanup and environmental restoration of formerly used defense sites. The increase would be offset by a $25.1 million reduction in the Army Research and Development account, specifically the Ground Combat Vehicle Program.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 113-170 to restore funding for Environmental Restoration, Formerly Used Defense Sites to FY 2013 levels so that the Department of Defense can clean up and remediate Unexploded Ordnance in a timely and safe fashion.
